org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.throttle

接口 ThroughputController

  • 所有超级接口:
    Stoppable
    所有已知实现类:
    NoLimitThroughputController, PressureAwareCompactionThroughputController, PressureAwareFlushThroughputController, PressureAwareThroughputController

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Configuration")
public interface ThroughputController
extends Stoppable
    A utility that constrains the total throughput of one or more simultaneous flows by sleeping when necessary.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      long control(String name, long size)
      Control the throughput.
      void finish(String name)
      Finish the controller.
      void setup(RegionServerServices server)
      Setup controller for the given region server.
      void start(String name)
      Start the throughput controller.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Stoppable

        isStopped, stop

    • 方法详细资料

      • setup

        void setup(RegionServerServices server)
        Setup controller for the given region server.

      • start

        void start(String name)
        Start the throughput controller.

      • control

        long control(String name,
             long size)
      throws InterruptedException
        Control the throughput. Will sleep if too fast.
        返回:
        the actual sleep time.
        抛出:
        InterruptedException

      • finish

        void finish(String name)
        Finish the controller. Should call this method in a finally block.
